name: Introduction to Land Art
description: This course introduces the student to the fundamentals of Land Art. The course will cover the history of Land Art, its influence on the art world, and the basic principles of design and construction.

name: Land Art Design
description: This course focuses on the design process for Land Art, introducing students to the fundamentals of design and the use of materials. The course will also discuss the legal considerations of designing and building Land Art.

name: Land Art Construction
description: This course focuses on the construction process for Land Art, introducing students to the fundamentals of construction and the use of materials. The course will also discuss the safety considerations of constructing Land Art.

name: Advanced Land Art
description: This course focuses on more advanced design and construction techniques for Land Art. The course will cover the use of more complex materials and tools, as well as the application of various aesthetic principles.
